triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: Core focus of the survey covering decision tree concepts, algorithms, and development.

triples.name: CART
triples.relevance: Classification and Regression Tree algorithm explicitly discussed as one of the key decision tree methods.

triples.name: ID3 algorithm
triples.relevance: Iterative Dichotomiser 3 algorithm covered as a foundational decision tree method.

triples.name: C4.5 algorithm
triples.relevance: Important decision tree algorithm that extended ID3, explicitly mentioned in the survey.

triples.name: Chi-square automatic interaction detection
triples.relevance: CHAID decision tree technique explicitly mentioned as one of the algorithms covered in the survey.

triples.name: Random forest
triples.relevance: Tree-based ensemble algorithm explicitly discussed as a high-performing method in the survey.

triples.name: Gradient boosting
triples.relevance: Gradient-boosted decision trees covered as one of the recent high-performing ensemble algorithms.

triples.name: Ensemble learning
triples.relevance: Fundamental concept underlying the tree-based ensemble algorithms covered in the survey.

triples.name: Computer-aided diagnosis
triples.relevance: Medical diagnosis application where decision tree methods are applied and discussed in the survey.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence in fraud detection
triples.relevance: Fraud detection application where decision tree methods are applied and discussed in the survey.
